title: Calories in a Roma Tomato
meta_description: Learn calories in a Roma tomato, plus carbs, fiber, protein, fat, and full nutrition breakdown for this low-calorie vegetable.
assumptions: Medium Roma tomato, raw, about 62 g; values based on USDA data for plum tomatoes.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by size, ripeness, variety, and growing conditions. Check labels or apps for specifics.

quick_answer.text: A medium Roma tomato contains about 11 calories and 2.4 g of carbs.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Chopped in salad with 1 tbsp dressing

faqs.q: How many calories in a Roma tomato?
faqs.a: About 11 calories for a medium one (62 g).
Yes, one has ~2.4 g carbs, with 0.7 g fiber.

faqs.q: What's the protein in a Roma tomato?
faqs.a: Roughly 0.6 g protein per medium tomato.
Very lowâ€”only 0.1 g total fat, no saturated or trans fat.

faqs.q: How does size affect calories in Roma tomatoes?
faqs.a: Smaller ones (~50 g) have ~9 kcal; larger (~80 g) ~14 kcal.
